      • onRefreshButtonClicked

        public void onRefreshButtonClicked()
        Handles a click to the refresh button. Calls the listener's onRefreshButtonClicked method from a new thread, so that several clicks from different view holders will not interfere with each other.

      • setItemPresentation

        protected void setItemPresentation(Account cryptoAccount)
        Description copied from class: BaseRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder
        Sets the presentation of the data for this ViewHolder. Subclasses need to provide their own implementations according to the model they are bound to. This method is called after an item is bound.
        Specified by:
        setItemPresentation in class BaseRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder<Account>
